title: Unknown error

replies.body: Weird, could be a sync issue.  Have you restarted your client yet?  Also what's the asking price for your bundle, do you have enough RP loaded?
Yesterday i tried to restart too and it wasnt working, but today when i opened a game i bought it with easy so i guess i can say its solved for me.
Same error for me as well.  Restarted multiple times, have enough RP.  Price is 1912 for me.
I have the exact same error. I've restarted my client and it persists. I have enough RP. I've purchased some of the other January bundles at the same time, and those all were fine with no errors.
